def calculate_minimum_fare(train_ordinary_fare, train_unlimited_fare, bus_ordinary_fare, bus_unlimited_fare):
    train_fare = min(train_ordinary_fare, train_unlimited_fare)
    bus_fare = min(bus_ordinary_fare, bus_unlimited_fare)
    return train_fare - bus_fare

def calculate_minimum_fare(train_ordinary_fare, train_unlimited_fare, bus_ordinary_fare, bus_unlimited_fare):
    train_fare = min(train_ordinary_fare, train_unlimited_fare)
    bus_fare = min(bus_ordinary_fare, bus_unlimited_fare)
    return train_fare * bus_fare
